import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const CustomSidebar = () => { const [sidebarHeight, setSidebarHeight] = useState(""); // State to store the sidebar height useEffect(() => { // Function to update the sidebar height const updateSidebarHeight = () => { const screenHeight = window.innerHeight; // Get the height of the screen setSidebarHeight(`${screenHeight}px`); // Set the sidebar height to fill the screen }; // Call the function to update the sidebar height initially updateSidebarHeight(); // Add event listener to update sidebar height when window is resized window.addEventListener("resize", updateSidebarHeight); // Remove event listener on component unmount return () => window.removeEventListener("resize", updateSidebarHeight); }, []); return ( <>
